product_name: National Book Network IronFit Secrets for Half Iron-Distance Triathlon Success
long_description: Ready to conquer the half-distance Ironman? IronFit Secrets for Half Iron-Distance Triathlon Success offers tested advice and sample training programs to get you ready for race day.
